hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Thanaweya Store is the leading store in the world of educational books and tools. We provide the best shopping experience for books and educational tools in Egypt with guaranteed quality and safety in every transaction.

content.title: Our Vision & Mission
content.vision: Our vision is to be the first and most trusted destination for students and teachers in Egypt and the Arab world, by providing the best educational books and tools that contribute to developing the educational process.
content.mission: Our mission is to support students' educational journey by providing high-quality books and advanced educational tools, while providing exceptional customer service and ensuring customer satisfaction at every step.
content.commitment: We are committed to providing an exceptional shopping experience with guaranteed quality and safety, and we always strive to develop our services and expand our library to include the latest curricula and most famous educational books.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services and products

questions.return_policy: Can I return or exchange books?
questions.contact_support: How can I contact customer service?
questions.grade_books: Are there books for different grades?
questions.book_quality: What is the quality of the books provided?

answers.how_to_order: You can order books easily by browsing the website and selecting the required books, then adding them to the cart and proceeding to the payment page. We offer multiple and secure payment methods.
answers.payment_methods: We accept cash on delivery, bank transfer, and electronic payment via credit cards. All transactions are secure and protected.
answers.delivery_time: We deliver orders within 2-5 business days within Cairo, and 3-7 days for other governorates. Delivery is free for orders over 500 EGP.
answers.return_policy: Yes, you can return or exchange books within 14 days of purchase, provided they are in good condition and sealed.
answers.student_discount: Yes, we offer special discounts for students up to 20% on educational books. You can get the discount by proving your student status.
answers.contact_support: You can contact us by phone: 01234567890, or via WhatsApp, or email: info@thanawyastore.com. We are available 24/7 to serve you.
answers.grade_books: Yes, we have books for all educational levels from primary to secondary, in addition to university books and scientific references.
answers.book_quality: All our books are original and conform to official curricula, with guaranteed high quality and clear printing. We deal with the best certified publishing houses.
